title: Image Converter
description: Convert images between JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP, and TIFF formats

sections.title: About Image Conversion
content: Convert images between popular formats with quality preservation and instant results. Perfect for web optimization, print preparation, and format compatibility.

sections.title: Supported Formats
content: JPG/JPEG - Most common compressed image format
PNG - Lossless format with transparency support
WebP - Modern web format with superior compression
GIF - Animated images and simple graphics
TIFF - High-quality format for print and archival

sections.title: Common Use Cases
content: Convert PNG to JPG to reduce file size
Convert JPG to PNG for transparency
Convert images to WebP for web optimization
Prepare images for print or web

sections.title: Format Comparison
content: JPG: Best for photos, smaller file sizes, no transparency
PNG: Best for graphics, supports transparency, larger files
WebP: Best for web, excellent compression, modern browsers
GIF: Best for simple animations, limited colors
TIFF: Best for print and professional photography
